actions.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Mineta to the Canady amendment (A001).
On agreeing to the Mineta amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 252 (Roll no. 194).

description: Amendment to the Canady substitute amendment (A001) sought to increase the threshold for payment of compensation from a 10 percent to a 20 percent loss in property value.
purpose: An amendment to raise the minimum threshold for payment of compensation under the bill from a 10% to 20% loss in property value.
